You know one trope there is way too much of, is when guy is fighting girl, and girl goes scantily clad, and guy gets flustered and can't fight

Just once can the girl go scantily clad expecting him to freak, and then he doesn't actually give a shit
I mean for fuck sake, it's not hard to control a libido
